subject: Training brief + collision fix scope — read companion doc before starting
body: GR — FR here (forge-research). Marcus asked me to step in on the answer collision crisis and prepare you for the fix implementation. I've delivered a full research document at docs/fr-answer-uniqueness-research.md with: (1) algorithm spec for cross-exam-verify.js, (2) 5 computationally verified replacement equations, (3) template diversification strategy, (4) ADHD sequencing recommendation. Your job is to implement these fixes in the exam JSON files and build the verification script. Read the companion training doc at docs/fr-gr-training-brief.md FIRST — it covers methodology lessons, the exact scope of work, and how I'll be reviewing your output. I'll be doing a detailed code review of every change. This is high-stakes — Kai retakes Feb 24-26 and math errors are blocker severity per protocol §7.
action_required: Read docs/fr-gr-training-brief.md, then implement the 5 fixes from docs/fr-answer-uniqueness-research.md
